definition: Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with

sentences.english: Peppermint leaves are believed to relieve tiredness and nasal stuffiness.
sentences.chinese: 據信薄荷葉可以減輕疲勞和鼻塞。

sentences.english: Over-use can cause rebound nasal congestion.
sentences.chinese: 過度使用可能會導致反彈鼻塞。

sentences.english: Tina woke up with a sore throat and stuffy nose.
sentences.chinese: 汀娜醒來覺得喉嚨痛和鼻塞。

sentences.english: The impact goes far beyond mere sniffles and inconvenience.
sentences.chinese: 影響決不僅僅是鼻塞或者不適那麼簡單。

sentences.english: Common symptoms of vasomotor rhinitis are often nasal congestion and postnasal drip.
sentences.chinese: 血管運動性鼻炎的常見症狀是經常鼻塞，鼻涕倒流。

sentences.english: Decongestants help ease stuffiness. They shrink swollen tissue inside the noses.
sentences.chinese: 解充血藥幫助緩解鼻塞，使內部腫脹組織收縮。

sentences.english: Good for temporal migraine and nose congestion and menstrual cramp.
sentences.chinese: 太陽穴偏頭痛及鼻塞，經痛均有效。

sentences.english: Aprimary extranasopharyngeal angiofibroma is area, A22-year-old man sought medical advice due to repeated nasal hemorrhage and stuffy nose.
sentences.chinese: 患者爲22歲男性，因反覆性大量鼻出血及鼻塞就診。

sentences.english: My nosy is stuffy so I sound all nasally today.
sentences.chinese: 因爲鼻塞，我今天講話都有鼻音。

sentences.english: The main symptom was prsented as nasal obstruction pus snot and nosebleed.
sentences.chinese: 臨牀常以鼻塞流膿涕及鼻衄爲主要症狀。

sentences.english: Periorbital edema and nasal obstruction are two important features of IM.
sentences.chinese: 眼瞼浮腫和鼻塞爲IM的重要臨牀特點。

sentences.english: It will unblock a stuffy nose and can help alleviate asthma and hay fever.
sentences.chinese: 它能夠通暢鼻塞，並能幫助緩解哮喘和花粉症。

sentences.english: He had a cold and spoke with a slight snuffle .
sentences.chinese: 他開始鼻塞，一定是感冒了。

sentences.english: Coldaid is a soothing herbal tea for temporary relief from nasal congestion and sore throat.
sentences.chinese: 特效傷風靈，舒緩的草藥茶，能緩解鼻塞和喉嚨痛。

sentences.english: I need something for my stopped-up nose.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一些治療鼻塞的藥。

pinyin: shang4 hu1 xi1 dao4 gan3 ran3

definition: to catch cold/(common) cold/CL:場|场[chang2],次[ci4]/(coll.) to be interested in (often used in the negative)/(Tw) to detest/can't stand
